encumberFunds(address,uint256,uint256).details: See {IBionetFunds} Called by buyer to escrow funds Will revert if:  - amount requested msg.value < price Emits Event

releaseFunds(uint256,address,address,uin.details: See {IBionetFunds} Releases funds to parties based in the current exchange state. Calculates fees and adjusts escrow as needed. Currently only releases funds for 3 states: Cancel, Revoke, Complete. More will be added. Emits Events

withdraw(address,uint256).details: See {IBionetFunds} Decrease escrow balance and send 'amount' to the 'account' Will revert if:  - amount requested is > escrow balance Emits Event

documentation.text:
Manage funds for the protocol.  Maintains escrow and protocol fees.
 Uses Eth.
